definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: They are often model figures portraying humans or other living creatures.
sentences.chinese: 手办通常是人物或其他生物的模型。

sentences.english: "Smile for Japan" is the catchphrase for the figure!
sentences.chinese: “为日本微笑”正是这个手办的主题。

definition: (Internet slang) cosplay/to cosplay/to dress up as
toy in a capsule (dispensed from a vending machine)
cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
two-dimensional/the fictional worlds of anime, comics and games
Akihabara, region of downtown Tokyo famous for electronics stores
three-dimensional/the real world (cf. 二次元[er4 ci4 yuan2])
